status.description: route status, 1 to enable, 0 to disable

key.description: the key of chash for dynamic load balancing

scheme.description: The scheme of the upstream. For L7 proxy, it can be one of grpc/grpcs/http/https. For L4 proxy, it can be one of tcp/tls/udp. For specific protocols, it can be kafka.

verify.description: Turn on server certificate verification, currently only kafka upstream is supported
